Activity: Check emails for any feedback on the meeting summary from @ITPM-1, @CLINLEAD-1, @DA-1, @HIS-1. Review any updates.
Analyze the cost estimates and timelines provided by the EHR vendor. Compare the proposed solutions with alternative options and assess the overall value proposition.

Prepare a cost-benefit analysis of the proposed EHR updates and modifications. Include factors such as development costs, implementation costs, ongoing maintenance costs, and potential benefits of improved data collection and analysis.
Present the cost-benefit analysis to @ITPM-1 and @CLINLEAD-1. Discuss the findings and make a recommendation regarding the proposed solutions.
Lunch Break. Celebrate almost completing the week!

If the proposed solutions are approved, begin developing a detailed project plan outlining the specific tasks, resources, and timelines required for implementation. @ITPM-1 help to finalize the timeline.
Identify and assign roles and responsibilities for each task in the project plan. Ensure all team members understand their roles and expectations.
Schedule a kickoff meeting with all stakeholders to review the project plan and discuss the next steps. Confirm attendance with @ITPM-1, @CLINLEAD-1, @DA-1, @HIS-1, @QATEST-1, @RN-1, @EHRV-1.
Prepare a summary of the week's accomplishments, including the meeting with the EHR vendor, the cost-benefit analysis, and the development of the project plan. Send to @ITPM-1.
Wrap up the week by organizing notes and documents related to the project. Prepare for next week's tasks and enjoy the weekend!
